name: Agent Leon: Recondite Project-Beta
description:
Our Hero Agent Leon in his first adventure in our new Games series "Agent Leon"

and now you are going to play the first game in the series" Agent Leon: Recondite Project"

  • Decide  what will happen by choosing many choices
  • 2 ends that will affect the future
  • Enjoy !

----------------------------------------------------

Recondite: is a magical metal made by Cross.Inc that has a maigical radiation affected the world because of the big amount of it

Agent Leon Abram : an agent works in ColossalTech to stop dangerous plans from Cross.Inc 

Agent Mo:  a monkey that transformed to a smart monkey agent because of the magical radiation 

Dr.Desiderio Oscar: the main villain who works in Cross.Inc and built a mech powerd by Recondite to take over the world
